comment.py¶

This module is to create the regions of the Comments.

Note: The comments are exactly the sames for each on of the types of data hierarchies.

class comment.CreateCommentFile(filepath)[source]¶

Class responsible to retrieve the comment of each annotation from the Annotation Tree.

Methods

create_cmts_xml()[source]¶

Creates an xml file with all the comments of the Annotation Tree file.

See also

poioapi.data
Here you can find more about the data

hierarchies.
